author: leonardogiannini
body:
#### PR description:

This PR is a backport of:

-  PR  [#31988](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31988)   -->  ONNX implementation of DeepVertex and DeepVertex+DeepJet combined taggers 

- PR  [#26088](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/26088)   --> Features and first version of DeepJet (only the features are now relevant)

no changes are made to the standard workflow. b tagging algorithms are added for a b-tag scale factor campaign



#### PR validation:

- an extensive validation has been performed when merging  PR [#31988](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/31988) 

- a comparison of the results in 10_6_x and 11_2_x has also been made: running the test configuration [test_deep_vertexcomb_cfg.py](https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/blob/master/RecoBTag/ONNXRuntime/test/test_deep_vertexcomb_cfg.py) (with the relevant switches set to True), no differences in deepVertex and negligible differences (10^-5) for the deepJet and the combined discriminator are found



see below a sample of the diff: 
![image](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/7805577/104746102-203f8a00-574f-11eb-9357-ab904ed15c90.png)
title: Deepvertex and DeepJet+DeepVertex combination backport to 10_6_x
